name: stream-length
description: for a given buffer or stream, this module will attempt to determine the total length of the stream contents. it currently supports buffers, `fs` streams, `http` responses, and `request` objects, and allows for specifying custom stream types.
kwds: for a given buffer or stream, this module will attempt to determine the total length of the stream contents. it currently supports buffers, `fs` streams, `http` responses, and `request` objects, and allows for specifying custom stream types. stream length content-length
